sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"批准"之意。
means: approve ：普通用词，常指正式的或官方的批准。
confirm ：强调按法律程序提请确认或批准。
sanction ：语气最强，多指官方的同意或批准，是书面用词。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个动词都有"证实"之意。
means: confirm ： 侧重以事实或以不容置疑的陈述来证实某事的正确与真实。
verify ： 强调以具体的事实和细节为证据。

sentence.Network_en: His new role could confirm him as one of our leading actors.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的新角色会确保他跻身我们的一流演员之列。

sentence.Network_en: Further scans are required to confirm the diagnosis of an abnormality.
sentence.Network_cn: 需要进一步扫描来确诊是否出现异常病变。

sentence.Network_en: Earlier reports were unable to confirm that there were any survivors.
sentence.Network_cn: 早先的报道无法证实是否有幸存者。

list.abs: The view has been confirmed scientifically ., 这种说法已得到了科学的印证.
· 保兑(CONFIRMED)信用证：是指经开证行以外的另一家银行加具保兑的信用证。保兑信用证主要是受益人（出口商）对开证银行 …
确认书(Confirmation)较正式合同简单，是买卖双方在通过交易磋商达成交易后，寄给双方加以确认的列明达成交易条件的书面证明， …
对道德学习者的“认可(confirmation)具有相当的道德发展牵引力,它能向学生呈现其最佳的发展可能性,包括可能实现的最佳道德自我的愿景。”而认可法本身的最佳实现.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French confermer, from Latin confirmare, from con- 'together' + firmare 'strengthen' (from firmus 'firm')

encyclopedia.content: confirm 是 javascript 语言中的一个方法。 主要用处是，他可以弹出一个包含"确定"与"取消"的对话方块。 用法：confirm(msg) msg 是提示信息 如果用户按下了确定，返回true;或者按下了取消，返回false 例如： <script type="text/javascript"> <!-- var OKNO = confirm("Selecting") alert(OKNO);//弹出对话方块 /*如果用户按下了“确定”， 在弹出的对话方块里会出现 “TRUE”

entry.def: If something confirms what you believe, suspect, or fear, it shows that it is definitely true.

example.ex: X-rays have confirmed that he has not broken any bones...
These new statistics confirm our worst fears about the depth of the recession...
example.tran: 这些新的统计数据证实经济衰退已经严重到我们最为担忧的境地。

entry.def: If you confirm something that has been stated or suggested, you say that it is true because you know about it.

example.ex: The spokesman confirmed that the area was now in rebel hands...
example.tran: 这位发言人证实该地区现已落入叛乱分子手中。

example.ex: He confirmed what had long been feared...
example.tran: 他证实了人们长期以来的担心。

entry.tran: (通常指通过信件或电话)确定，确认(安排或预约)
entry.def: If you confirm an arrangement or appointment, you say that it is definite, usually in a letter or on the telephone.

example.ex: You make the reservation, and I'll confirm it in writing.
example.tran: 你来预订，我会去函确认。

entry.tran: 为…施坚振礼（或坚信礼）(从而正式成为基督教会的成员)
entry.def: If someone is confirmed, they are formally accepted as a member of a Christian church during a ceremony in which they say they believe what the church teaches.

example.ex: He was confirmed as a member of the Church of England.
example.tran: 他领受了坚振礼，成为英国国教会的一员。

entry.tran: 使坚定，使确信(自己的决定、信仰或观点)
entry.def: If something confirms you in your decision, belief, or opinion, it makes you think that you are definitely right.

example.ex: It has confirmed me in my decision not to become a nun.
example.tran: 这使我更加坚定了不做修女的决心。

entry.tran: 加强，巩固(地位、角色或权力)
entry.def: If someone confirms their position, role, or power, they do something to make their power, position, or role stronger or more definite.

example.ex: Williams has confirmed his position as the world's number one snooker player.
example.tran: 威廉姆斯巩固了自己世界头号斯诺克选手的地位。

entry.tran: 巩固，确保(某人的名声、角色或地位)
entry.def: If something confirms you as something, it shows that you definitely deserve a name, role, or position.

example.ex: His new role could confirm him as one of our leading actors.
example.tran: 他的新角色会确保他跻身我们的一流演员之列。

means.word_mean: 1. establish or strengthen as with new evidence or facts;
4. as of a person to a position;

sentences.sentence: "The Senate confirmed the President's candidate for Secretary of Defense"

means.word_mean: 5. administer the rite of confirmation to;

sentences.sentence: "the children were confirmed in their mother's faith"

auth_sentence.content: Straightforward urine and blood tests can confirm the diagnosis.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Straightforward urine and blood tests can confirm the diagnosis.

auth_sentence.content: We cannot confirm dark matter at this time.
auth_sentence.res_content: We cannot confirm dark matter at this time.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We cannot confirm dark matter at this time.

auth_sentence.content: On the contrary, they consistently confirm the Bible.
auth_sentence.res_content: On the contrary, they consistently confirm the Bible.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: On the contrary, they consistently confirm the Bible.

stems_affixes.word_buile: confirm[v.坚定;证实]+ed……的→adj.坚固的;习惯的,积习的
in不+firm坚定→adj.弱的,虚弱的,柔弱的
infirm虚弱的+ary场所→虚弱人呆的地方

Sentence.sentence: A search is now under way to confirm the suspected existence of particles of matter that move at a speed greater than light, and therefore, might serve as our passports to the past.
Although no form of matter yet discovered moves as fast as or faster than light, scientific experiments have already confirmed that accelerated motion causes a traveler's time to be stretched.
And that box there to confirm you have known driving convictions, thank you, and then sign there.
This should have primed the subjects with "stereotype threat" – an anxiety that their results will confirm negative stereotypes, which has been shown to damage the performance of African Americans.

means.word_mean: 证实, 证明; 肯定, 确认

sentences.cn: 这消息坚定了我的决心。

sentences.en: The king confirmed that the election would be held on July 20th.
sentences.cn: 国王批准选举在7月20日举行。

sentences.en: The President confirmed him as Secretary of State.
The treaty was confirmed by the president.

jushi.english: They worked out an effective method, which was confirmed by the leadership.
jushi.chinese: 他们制定了一种有效的方法,这种方法得到了领导的认可。

jushi.english: What he observed confirmed his judgement.
jushi.chinese: 他观察到的现象证实了他的判断。
